column4: I'm trying to install ndiswrapper by following a wiki, and it's been fine up until this command: sed -e "a/misc/kernel\/drivers\/net\/ndiswrapper lg" debian/rules debian/temp
the error it gave me was: sed: -e expression #1, char 43: unterminated `s command
no one in ndiswrapper has been idle for less than 2 hours.
